title: Zoo creatures great and small
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Rob McCubbin and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Andrew Tribe, zoo veterinarian, and Jeanne de Lacy, zoo keeper, both from Royal Melbourne Zoological Gardens, Zoo Education Service Staff, are interviewed by Trevor Lunn. Animals come to the zoo, often after car accidents and are examined and treated in the veterinary department or nursery. Training for zoo keepers and zoo veterinarians is discussed.
